scripts.setup: pnpm run clean && rm -rf pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm install && pnpm run format && pnpm run lint && pnpm run check-types && pnpm run build && pnpm run dev
scripts.setup:update: pnpm run clean && rm -rf pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm install && pnpm run update && pnpm run clean && rm -rf pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm install && pnpm run format && pnpm run lint && pnpm run check-types && pnpm run build && pnpm run dev
